mapper.insert: insert into tbl_vxlan_allocations(id, vxlan_domain_id, vxlan_id, allocated) values(#{id}, #{vxlanDomainId}, #{vxlanId}, #{allocated})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_vxlan_allocations where vxlan_domain_id = #{vxlanDomainId} and allocated = 1 order by vxlan_id desc limit 1
select * from tbl_vxlan_allocations where vxlan_domain_id = #{vxlanDomainId} and vxlan_id = #{vxlanId} and allocated = 1
select * from tbl_vxlan_allocations where vxlan_domain_id = #{vxlanDomainId} and allocated = 0 limit 1
mapper.update: update tbl_vxlan_allocations set allocated = 1 where id = #{id} and allocated = 0
update tbl_vxlan_allocations set allocated = 0 where id = #{id} and allocated = 1
